body.name: Neukniy 3X 120mm Computer Fan with AC Plug, AC 110V 120V 220V 240V Cabinet Cooling Fan with Speed Controller, Cooling for Windows, Plant Cabinet, Crawl Space, Basement, Laundry Room, Garage, Attic
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 mins
features: 【Wide Applications】Three 120mm fans powered by a wall-wart. it’s really easy to adjust their speed with a knob. it works great for DIY fan or as an additional cooling fan for your gaming needs, such as plant cabinet, Crawl space, Basement, Laundry room, Garage, Attic, RV refrigerator, X-box, ps4, Amplifier, kitchen window, server, humidifier, mushroom growing, sound system, etc.

【Variable Speed with AC Plug】The variable speed fan is great for cooling electronic components. This is especially true when components are used in a cabinet with limited air flow to help cooling. By having variable speed, you can adjust the speed for proper cooling with the least fan noise from the circulating air. And you can Plug in a wall outlet to use.

【Adjustable Wind】 We have taken into account your various needs, the fan can rotate speed from 900rpm to 3000rpm, providing the most suitable wind to quickly cool your devices down. You can get just the right airflow with the lowest noise.
【Dual Ball Bearing】Double bearing fan motors will give long life. Long life with 6-years. and allows the fans to be laid flat or upright.
【What's in the box】You will get a finished Rack Cooling Fan(3x 120mm fans are bound together), 1x Speed Controller, 12x Install Screws, 4x Rubber feet, 2x Cable ties

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ventilation fan with variable speed, variable voltage input One of the standout features of this fan is its variable speed and variable voltage input. This means that you can adjust the speed and voltage of the fan to suit your needs, allowing for greater control and energy efficiency. The fan also comes with dampers, which allows you to regulate the airflow within the cabinet, ensuring that the temperature is maintained at a consistent level.The installation process of this fan is straightforward, and it can be mounted either horizontally or vertically, depending on your needs. Once installed, it operates quietly and efficiently, without producing any vibrations that could potentially damage your electronics.Using this fan to keep your electronics cool is an excellent way to extend the life of your equipment. Electronic devices generate a lot of heat, and if not properly ventilated, this heat can cause damage or even failure. With this cabinet ventilation fan, you can ensure that your electronics are kept cool and protected, allowing them to operate at optimal performance.The fan is also made of high-quality materials that are built to last. The blades are made of durable plastic, and the housing is made of aluminum, which makes it lightweight and corrosion-resistant. The fan is also equipped with a ball bearing system that ensures a long lifespan and efficient operation.Overall, the cabinet ventilation fan with variable speed, variable voltage input, and dampers is an excellent product that is versatile, efficient, and easy to install. Its ability to regulate airflow and temperature makes it an essential addition to any electronics cabinet.
Specifications of Cooling Fan Fan Size 14x4.7x1.0in Voltage 12V Speed 3000RPM x3 Airflow 105CFM x3 Noise 55dBA Power 12W Current 0.35A x3 Bearing Dual Ball

Keeping Your Servers Cool Installed these to keep some server computers cool up at the top of a closet where all the heat gathers.The unit plugs into the wall, and allows you to select a fan speed from slow to fast (and off) to precisely select the amount of cooling and the noise tradeoff that works for your instance. This is a nice feature. It comes with standoffs and insulators to help prevent fan noise from transferring to the cabinet. Another nice feature.

Specifications of Speed Controller Dimension 3.5x2.0x1.2in Input 100v-240v 50/60Hz Output DC 3v-12v 200-2000ma Cable Length 6.0ft Safety Protection Automatic overload cut-off, over voltage cut-off, automatic thermal cut-off, short circuit protection.

120mm 12V Computer fan with AC 100-240V Speed Controller 2x 120mm 12V Computer fan with AC 100-240V Speed Controller 3x 120mm 12V Computer fan with AC 100-240V Speed Controller Fan Voltage 12V 12V 12V Input of Speed Controller 100V-240V 100V-240V 100V-240V Speed Min. 900RPM (3V) 900RPM x2 (3V) 900RPM x3 (3V) Speed Max. 3000RPM (12V) 3000RPM x2 (12V) 3000RPM x3 (12V) Airflow max. 105CFM 105CFM x2 105CFM x3 Bearing Dual Ball Dual Ball Dual Ball

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars functions as described
reviews.reviewText: after slight modifications to the installation plate on the heater to accept the fan kit, functions well, is very quiet and really powerful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It cools my components and provides addition heat for the winter.
reviews.reviewText: I have four of these to take care of any over heating from my entertainment components. I might get a couple more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This item is just great
reviews.reviewText: It's exactly as represented and just works, including the speed control. They make the expected level of noise at maximum speed. Good build quality as far as I can tell.I'm actually experimenting with them to make an air cleaner (i.e. sucking air through a filter). So far I am happy with the results.Note that the three fans are really a unit. You could separate them but will have work to do to rewire them. Doable, but they are clearly intended to remain as a unit.Great value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this and it stopped working but they did replace it. I appreciate your good customer service!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Installed it to a gravity wall heater.
reviews.reviewText: I was able to attach this fan to a decades-old, gravity wall heater (gas) and greatly increase the heating ability of the unit. My apartment, heats up more quickly and with greater warmth now. The fan has an adjustable speed control. It has worked perfectly for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This works great for cooling my broadcasting equipment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use these on hydronic radiators, not to move so much air that it cools down, but enough to get wamth pushed down onto the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice AC-based fan array for project boxes and electronics furniture
reviews.reviewText: I've got a couple of places where I need some more dedicated airflow, but a box fan is not as graceful as I want. I got this fan array to build into a cluster enclosure to keep air clean and cool. I'll be mounting the switch control on the outside, along with a master power switch and Ethernet drop jack, so that the cluster enclosure can be like an appliance. But so far outside the box it gives some good airflow without too much noise (it'll be in the garage, with some filtration to keep dust and leaves out).
